remarks: Subtraction property of a linear operator.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnosub.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
lnosub.5 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
lnosub.6 $e |- N = ( -v ` W ) $.
lnosub.7 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
lnosub $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T e. L ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( T ` ( A M B ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) N ( T ` B ) ) ) $.
